# headerCell

**Instance Property**

The cell used to draw the table column’s header.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var headerCell: NSTableHeaderCell { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property must not be `nil`. It’s recommended that the value of this property be an instance or subclass of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableHeaderCell].

You can set the table column title using the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableColumn/title] property.

## Setting the Header

- **title**: The title of the table column’s header.

items.description: The title of the table column’s header.
